title: I feel like the reason vayne is doing so good is a combination of self peel, stealth, and mobility
body: I feel as though vaynes damage itself is tolerable in a end game hyper carry but the real problem comes in when she can peel off juggernauts effortlessly, dodge skillshots like they never existed, and being able to surprise and basically disappear in team fight till she pops up and one shots you.

replies.body:
So its not her damage? It definitely must be her kit that shes had since 2011 lolz

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Her damage is reasonable if she didnt have the mobility.....Listen before you post like this, if she cant go invis then talon can jump on her and one shot her, if she cant roll then sion can land his knock up letting people jump on her, if she cant E she wouldnt be able to stun and push people off before they even get on her.....Her damage is reasonable if you remove the self peel, mobility, stealth.......

You're not listening. Her kit has been the same since 2011. What you're complaining about is rediculous. 

And guess what? She needs these things in her kit because all her abilities are SINGLE TARGET. She needs to be able to kite and knock people back and tumble skill shots and on top of that all her abilites are AA range. Take away her Q and E and stealth from her R and what does she have? She would be garbage just like this post.

I am listening. Im saying their is multiple solutions to the problem like removing things that would allow her to peel so easily or stun or dodge I get it single target woohoo but who cares single target adcs dont always get these stupid things.....Jhin why doesnt he have all this mobility and stealth????? I mean hes a single target adc........ Or kog maw yes you can get a ruunans (MY SPELLING) but cant you build that on vayne lmao your point is valid but so is mine we can keep the damage and nerf other parts or nerf the damage and keep the other parts and dont go personally attacking people just sorta breaking rules of the boards btw.

Also her items are cheap and she gets a much easier laning phase rn with the relic meta.  When the relic meta gets nerfed then she will still have all the rest of her problems but at least she won't just waltz through laning phase anymore.
